item.description:
AMC Cardigan Lodge 2013 Trail Work Weekends

 

Help give something back to the forest, trails and lodge that serves us well: we are looking forward to fun, rewarding work, camaraderie, getting dirty, learning new skills and and old and new friendships!

 

Three trailwork weekends are held each year at the lodge, with this year's events occurring on May 3-5, Sep 6-8, and Oct 25-27. Working with experienced leaders, take on projects from basic brushing to trail hardening to replacing and/or installing advanced rock and wood structures.

You don’t need to be an expert--enthusiasm and a love for our woods and trails is all it takes. Sign up early—there can be a waiting list. Those with prior experience and qualified leaders and/or instructors are also welcome and needed. For the first trail work weekend in early May, register with Carolyn Brooke by no later than April 28 at 617-738-0089 or chbrooke@comcast.net with $40 fee due (includes lodging, meals Fri. light supper – Sun lunch).
item.name: Mt. Cardigan Trailwork Weekend, Alexandria, NH--May 3-5
